oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Train wreck near Lewisburg, Tennessee, 1941 August
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial view of a train derailment near Lewisburg, Tennessee, circa August 29th, 1941. Freight cars, “at least twenty-two cars of a forty-car northbound Louisville and Nashville freight train were derailed [August 29th] near Anes Station, twelve miles north of Lewisburg.” Source: Nashville Banner. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company--History--Sources
